name: Night Fish
description:
What fish lurk at the bottom of the lake?

Spacebar- Cast lure

A/D or Left/Right arrows - Move back and forth

Game by: Jordan Dube @Jordanopoly
Main Tune: 'Round Midnight 
Composed by: Thelonious Monk
Performed by: Jordan Dube - Clarinet
Robbie Wancowicz - Piano
Alejandro Bertorelli - Bass
Patrick Jacob - Drums

Fun Fact: All the fish listed are real fish! The score is their size in centimeters.
